resources.string: Emotion Regulator
Emotion Confirmation
Tell me something!
Write something like a tweet or status message, and we will guess how you are feeling.
Write something here…
We guess that you are kind of calm right now.
We guess that you are feeling kinda happy now.
We guess that you are sad now.
We guess that you are angry or frustrated now.
Is this correct?
Do you want us to help you with down-regulating your negative emotions?
We got it wrong? Never mind, you can manually edit the sliders below to reflect your mood.
You can always press back if you changed your mind.
I\'m done!
Calm
Happy
Sad
Angry
Let\'s do some deep breaths to calm yourself down before continuing, shall we?
Inhale and exhale following the bar below, click Start to continue!
Ready
Inhale
Exhale
Finish!
Let\'s do it for a few times…
Let\'s do it one last time…
It is okay to feel sad, but if you need help snapping out from it, try to answer the questions below.
Your answers are not stored, so feel free to write anything you think about. You can also not write anything - you choose!
Your answer here…
What was a pretty delicious meal you previously had? Try describing it too.
What was something that you succeeded in doing?
What was an event you want to participate in again and why?
What was a happy surprise that you remember?
What is a place you really like and enjoy every moment you are there? And why?
What is something that you really like to do? Do you have any stories related to it?
Hope that you feel better now!
Do you want to come back a while later to continue the regulation?
We will remind you a while later then!
See you later!
See you next time!
Bye!
Welcome back!
Your emotion had probably changed while you\'re away. How do you feel now?
You seem to be in a pretty good mood then!
Yes
No
Start
Finish
Next
Stop
Positivity/negativity of your current emotion:
Level of intensity of your current emotion:
Estimated positivity/negativity of your current emotion:
Estimated level of intensity of your current emotion:
Please wait…
We are analysing and this will take a while.
EmotionRegulatorNotifications
Channel for delivering notifications for continuing the emotiion regulation cycle
